channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2023101491
item.description:
Report X-2023101491

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-17
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WITH NO MARKING LEFT ON HAZMAT STATION TABLE. A SIX-SIDED CHECK PERFORMED BY RESPONDER AND CONTENTS MADE A CLANGING NOISE. PACKAGE OPENED REVEALING 12 CANS OF FLAMMABLE AEROSOL. FURTHER OBSERVATION INDICATED THAT BOX HAD BEEN CONSTRUCTED INSIDE OUT, CONCEALING THE LABELING AND GROUND LIMITED QUANTITY DANGEROUS GOODS MARKINGS PREPRINTED ON THE BOX. PACKAGE REPORTED TO HMSC.
